BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.CatalogSwitchableDataSource.getDataSource() may expose internal representation by returning CatalogSwitchableDataSource.dataSource

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.CatalogSwitchableDataSource(DataSource, String, String) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into CatalogSwitchableDataSource.dataSource
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.config.PoolConfiguration.getCustomProperties() may expose internal representation by returning PoolConfiguration.customProperties

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.config.PoolConfiguration(Long, Long, Long, Integer, Integer, Boolean, Properties) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into PoolConfiguration.customProperties

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.creator.DataSourcePoolReflection(DataSource) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into DataSourcePoolReflection.dataSource

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.destroyer.DataSourcePoolDestroyer(DataSource) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into DataSourcePoolDestroyer.dataSource

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.metadata.DataSourcePoolMetaDataReflection(DataSource, DataSourcePoolFieldMetaData) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into DataSourcePoolMetaDataReflection.targetDataSource
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.props.creator.DataSourcePoolPropertiesCreator.toBoolean(Map, String) has Boolean return type and returns explicit null

org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.props.domain.custom.CustomDataSourcePoolProperties.getProperties() may expose internal representation by returning CustomDataSourcePoolProperties.properties
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.props.domain.synonym.PropertySynonyms.getLocalProperties() may expose internal representation by returning PropertySynonyms.localProperties
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.props.domain.synonym.PropertySynonyms.getStandardProperties() may expose internal representation by returning PropertySynonyms.standardProperties
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.datasource.pool.props.domain.synonym.PropertySynonyms.getStandardPropertyKeys() may expose internal representation by returning PropertySynonyms.standardPropertyKeys
